amendment.description: Amendment improves disclosures by eligible institutions receiving funding under the program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in part C of House Report 111-506 to improve disclosures by eligible institutions receiving funding under the program.

action.text: Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Green, Al.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Green, Al amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
